title: boys SOCCER: ansonia, crosby roll on
text:
Friday, October 9, 2015 1:05 AM EDT 
boys SOCCER: ansonia, crosby roll on ANSONIA 4, DERBY 2Goals: A — Bervan Uludag 3, Allan Fernandez 1; D — Bairon Chavez 1, Melvin Bolanos 1. Saves: A — Jordan Harrell 6; D — Salmin Catovic 11. Records: A 7-1-1; D 2-6.NAUGATUCK 2,TORRINGTON 0Goals: N — Candido Carrelo 1, Felipe Dutra 1. Saves: T — Aiden Mattiello 9; N — Rabbi Ahmed 2. Records: T 4-5; N 5-0-3.CROSBY 5, SACRED HEART 0Goals: C — Arben Bajrami 2, Kevin Hernandez 1 (PK), Gregory Lormilien 1, Dondre Johnson 1. Assists: C — Johnson 1, Nerwai 1. Saves: C — Damon Bultron 8; SH — Evan Laferriere 16. Records: C 8-2; SH 1-8.WOODLAND 4, WILBY 0Goals: Wo — Christian Poirier 3, Jack LaPerriere 1. Assists: Wo — LaPerriere 2, Adem Rifati 1, Zach Powanda 1. Saves: Wo — A.J. Oliveira 6; Wi — Christian Colon 10. Records: Wo 5-3; Wi 0-8.SEYMOUR 1, HOLY CROSS 0Goals: S — Colin Mattutini. Saves: HC — Kyle Moser 9; S — Peter Ragaini, 5. Records: HC 3-6; S 6-1-1.WATERTOWN 1,ST. PAUL 0 (2 OT)Goal: W — Dante Cancellaro (PK). Saves: W — John Sasso, 3; SP — Zachary Federowicz, 6. Records: W 7-1-2; SP 5-2.OXFORD 5, WOLCOTT 0Goals: O — Joshua Salgado 4, Sergey Castelot 1. Assists: O — Castelot 2, Jared Willams 2, Salgado 1. Saves: O — Michael Michaud 5; W — Nick Roth 7. Records: O 3-5-1; W 2-6.WOLCOTT TECH 5,MET. LEARNING CENTER 0Goals: WT — Josh Santiago 2, Mitch Sorenson 2, Colin Riggs 1. Saves: WT — Kyle Jansen 3; MLC — Rashid Jarvis 6. Records: WT 4-5; MLC 1-8-0.CANTERBURY 6,RYE COUNTRY DAY 2Goals: C—Mohammed Zakyi 3, Connor Amsley 1, Seidu Shamsudeen 2; RCD—Nick Sharpe 1, David Towley 1. Assists: C—Iván Baquerizo 2, Zakyi 1, Andrew Bortey 1, Tito Jiménez 1, Amsley 1; RCD—Towley 1. Saves: C—Andrew Bortey 3, Quinn Helmig 2; RCD—Noah Swan 3. Record: C 6-0.CHASE COLLEGIATE 6,HARVEY 1Goals: C — Jason Zoldy 4, Grant Varnum 1, Justin Butler 1; Jose Gaurdiano 1; Alden Landry 1; H — Isaac Culity 1; Assists: C — Dan Smyth Temple 1.
